name: cesql
short_description: Database Server based on NVIDIA CUDA™ Technology. CUDA™ makes it possible to use the GPU and its performance for parallel data computing.A classic sql server uses only about 15 GFlops instead of more than 500 GFlops which could be used by cesql.
